divs: Sighting DetailsI was running on a Thursday night April 5th 2007 at around 8:30 Pm it was cold but clear I saw a red light hovering in the distance about 1000 ft in hight I stoped running fro a moment to se what the hell this was it was bright and had a humming sound, it then droped somthing out of it a light or a prob like thing it went to the ground and seem to go underground, then the craft dimmed in light and moved to the left very fast and made a quick turn straight up almost a 90 degree turn instant, I know a Air plane can not do this I then felt like I was being watched so I continued running and went home, What the hell was this a meteor UFO or waht?? Please let me know because alot of people around here are seeing things but they are to embarised to admit it, they think they wikk be made fun of. Thank you Andy Wiltberger 847-652-8458
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Algonquin

Summary: Red Light with a humming sound aprox 1000 ft in hight then it lowered a light or some type of probe that went underground and disapeared??
